content: --सभं a collection of female slaves. (The <ab>gen.</ab> <ab>sing.</ab> दास्याः enters into some compounds, but loses its literal sense; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} दास्याःपुत्रः, --सुतः ‘a whore-son’, used as a term of abuse; दास्याःपुत्रैः शकुनिलुब्धकैः <ls>Ś. 2</ls>; but दास्याः सदृशी ‘like a female slave’).
